Name: The Gospel that Receives Harmonized Praise
AttributesDescription:
After casting Intro Skill, increases Crit. Rate of all Resonators in the team by 40% and Crit. DMG by 80% for 15s.

This Token can be used up to 2 times in Whimpering Wastes.
BgDescription: "Amidst the panicked Fools, he stood out, kneeling devoutly before the terrifying anomaly. Raising his brooch high, he chanted hymns, surrendering himself to the tide until he became one with it..."
ObtainedShowDescription: After casting Intro Skill, increases all team members' Crit. Rate by 40% and Crit. DMG by 80% for 15s.
